title: and................................im done
body:
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=midnightfox
u say im the 1 that needs improving
look for urselves. i admit i had 1 or 2 bad games but im so **** done with ranked idiots

replies.body:
and just after this post i break my tilt.
thank god...
Blah blah blah balh dear diary today I walked upstairs

... dude ive been challenger to d4 in 2 days, lost 20 games with positive kda.. this is nth

keep playing, if u play well every game u will eventually start winning. afterall luck plays a big part in soloq.

gl
